law.catch_line: KRS provisions applicable to various cooperative corporation organizations.
law.text: Unless otherwise provided in KRS 272.010(1) and KRS 272.020 to 272.044, a cooperative corporation organized with shares shall be subject to the provisions of KRS Chapter 271B, and a cooperative corporation organized with memberships and operated on a nonprofit basis shall be subject to the provisions of KRS 273.161 to 273.390.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 137, effective January 1, 2011. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986.
